Entries.default: "They're... happy? These folks are making the Skaenites look downright reasonable."
"Madiccho! These people are mad! And we are mad if we stand here and do nothing about this!"
"Not our dragon, not our problem. Right, captain?"
"Gracious glory! Seems to me they don't want saving!"
"Hylea's feathered ass! What the fuck be that?"
"That creature seems set on laying waste to this place. Should we intercede?"
"Now'd be a good time to turn around and walk away."
"I wish it would land on Arkemyr's manor next."
"Lewud Yezuha! We are fighting it, yes?"
